Method Detail

getText

public java.lang.String getText()
Returns text of the label

setPreserveFormatting

public void setPreserveFormatting(int wrapLength)
Enables label text format preserving and defines text wrapping length. When preserving is set to true, label, and wrap lendth is not null, text is dispayed as is, preserving line breaks and tabs, except lines that exeed in length. That lines will be wrapped. Setting wrap length to zero will disable text format preservation.

By default label format preserving is disabled.

setText

public void setText(java.lang.String text)
Sets text of the label. If text is null, sets text of the label to blank string
